# harser

```
POST https://github.com/danzelbel/harser
```

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: {project_key}/{repository_name}@v1.0.0
  with:
    uploadFile:
      description: ""
      required: false
    datetime:
      description: ""
      required: false
    text:
      description: ""
      required: false
    doublequotes:
      description: ""
      required: false
    path:
      description: ""
      required: false
```

## Inputs

- `uploadFile`: {description}.
- `datetime`: {description}.
- `text`: {description}.
- `doublequotes`: {description}.
- `path`: {description}.
